data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Zambales, Philippines to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 508,589 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zambales, Philippines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Zambales, Philippines who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 82,311 believers in the state of Zambales into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Zambales, Philippines.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the South Asian, general people might believe through him.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Zambales to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 82,311 believers in Zambales to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.section_summary:
the state of Zambales, Philippines has a population of 590,900.

We estimate Zambales has 82,311 people who might know Jesus, 455,203 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 53,386 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Zambales. Through your servants plant 118 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.
